Package Enginegames

Class ScrollButton

java.lang.Object
Enginegames.WorldObj
Enginegames.Button
Enginegames.ScrollButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tickable
public class ScrollButton
extends Button
A Button with a list of options to choose from. Selected item is changed with left- and right-click.

  • Field Summary

    If the button wraps around, when reaching an edge of the options
